Length.description: How far the wind extends from the fan.

Velocity.description: How much speed this object will send you off with.

OnTime.description: How long the fan stays on before turning off again.

OffTime.description: How long the fan stays off before turning on again.

InitialDelay.description: How long the object waits before starting the normal active/inactive cycle.

IsEventDriven.description: Whether this object is active by default or must be triggered by something first.

Extra.value: Underwater variants of the unused ObjFan.
